hints.content:
Let's use place value blocks to help us solve!

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1fe529ca6d205cd7efb92e40135304e0047224d5)

$538=\purpleD{5}\text{ hundreds} + \blueE{3}\text{ tens} + \maroonD{8}\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one hundred into tens, we will see that $1\text{ hundred}= 10\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8c372c3bcf29ff756e7c045ec7186ec8af75d650)

So, $\purpleD5\text{ hundreds} = \blueE{50}\text{ tens}$

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/93722a740d72435d6ec129098ed8c30bc500730b)

$\blueE{50}\text{ tens} + \blueE4\text{ tens} +\maroonD7\text{ ones}= \blueE{54}\text{ tens}+\maroonD7\text{ ones}$

If we break apart one ten into ones, we will see that $1\text{ ten}= 10\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e4fdf448967cc3f80b9adac27e4758efcc081e2c)

So, $\blueE{53}\text{ tens} = \maroonD{530}\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/de00629b090100fb2378117b6d8736b4f52c4e97)

$\maroonD{530}\text{ ones} + \maroonD8\text{ ones} = \maroonD{538}\text{ ones}$

question.content:
**Complete the equations.**

 |  | |  | | | | |
-: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: | :-: | -: | -: | -: 
$538 =$|$5$ |$\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$| $3$ | $\text{ tens}$ | $+$ | $8$ |$\text{ ones}$
$538=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 1]] | $\text{tens}$ |$+$ | $8$ | $\text{ ones}$
$538=$ | $0$| $\text{ hundreds}$ |$+$ | $0$| $\text{ tens}$ |$+$ | [[☃ numeric-input 2]] | $\text{ones}$
